name: A Legend of Wisdom Part I
name_original: A Legend of Wisdom Part I
description:
Enter the fantasy world and feel what it's like to be a real traveler! You woke up among ruins surrounded by a dense forest. You don't remember who you are or what you're doing here, so you embark on journey to find out.



You'll start making new friends - but also enemies. You will discover the truth about the local world and what secrets it hides.
Who knows what the future will be...



A Legend of Wisdom is a sci-fi platform game that requires strategic thinking.
You'll be casting spells, conquering peaks, crafting weapons, and arming yourself. You will face the greatest evil and free the world from power-hungry people.
